item.title: Min and Max value of an Array (Java)
item.description: There are many ways to obtain the min and maximum value of items inside of an Array. This blog post will show case its many ways. The most basic way to do this is to loop through the entire array manually. The benefit of doing it this way, is that it just relies on the standard library and can be easily rewritten to an even simpler form. This way uses the Math.
